```{r}
a <- rnorm(n = 100, mean = 10, sd = 1)
b <- rnorm(n = 100, mean = 15, sd = 1)


```

```{r}
overlap <- function(x, y) {
  F.x <- ecdf(x); F.y <- ecdf(y)
  z <- uniroot(
    function(z) F.x(z) + F.y(z) - 1, 
    interval <- c(min(c(x,y)), max(c(x,y))))
  
  return(list(Root = z, F.x = F.x, F.y = F.y))
}
```

```{r}
over <- overlap(a, b)

```
